GettingStarted.name: Getting Started

props.name: users
props.description: An instance of the Users selector that allows you to find, get and create users.

props.description: The GitHub token to authenticate requests with

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets a user, returning a User

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the user to get

props.name: base
props.description: The base API URL (with no trailing slash)

props.name: url
props.description: The full url with this.conf.path included.

props.name: httpOptions
props.description: The HTTP options forwarded to node-fetch

props.name: raw
props.description: The raw JSON returned from GitHub

methods.name: endpoint
methods.description: Makes a request to the GitHub API

methods.name: init
methods.description: Gets the raw JSON from the API.
